mapper.insert: INSERT INTO preset_tb ( user_id, product_id, preset_name, posted_user_id ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{productId}, #{presetName}, #{postedUserId} )

INSERT INTO preset_tb ( user_id, product_id, preset_name, posted_user_id ) SELECT #{userId}, pr.product_id, pr.preset_name, p.user_id FROM post_tb p JOIN preset_tb pr ON p.preset_id = pr.preset_id WHERE p.post_id = #{postId};
mapper.select: SELECT p.preset_id, p.user_id, p.product_id, p.preset_name, p.posted_user_id, u.nickname AS nickname, ( SELECT img.img_url FROM product_item_tb pi JOIN item_tb it ON pi.item_id = it.item_id JOIN image_tb img ON it.image_id = img.image_id WHERE pi.product_id = p.product_id LIMIT 1 ) AS imageUrl, ( SELECT it.price FROM product_item_tb pi JOIN item_tb it ON pi.item_id = it.item_id WHERE pi.product_id = p.product_id LIMIT 1 ) AS itemPrice FROM preset_tb p INNER JOIN user_tb u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE p.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.preset_id DESC

SELECT p.preset_id, p.user_id, p.product_id, p.preset_name, p.posted_user_id, u.nickname AS nickname, ( SELECT img.img_url FROM product_item_tb pi JOIN item_tb it ON pi.item_id = it.item_id JOIN image_tb img ON it.image_id = img.image_id WHERE pi.product_id = p.product_id LIMIT 1 ) AS imageUrl, ( SELECT it.price FROM product_item_tb pi JOIN item_tb it ON pi.item_id = it.item_id WHERE pi.product_id = p.product_id LIMIT 1 ) AS itemPrice FROM preset_tb p INNER JOIN user_tb u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE p.preset_id = #{presetId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM preset_tb WHERE preset_id = #{presetId} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM preset_tb WHERE user_id = #{userId}
